title: Bel Canto Note of regret inconsistencies

content.prompt: In context, the “note of regret” mentioned in the second paragraph most clearly serves to reveal a tension between the President’s

choices.label: public role and his private values
national ambitions and his Japanese identity
official duties and his personal obligations
introversion and his desire for attention

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
